Data science & AI: Building on 10+ years in architecture and DevOps, now formalising data science, ML and AI through the University of Cambridge Career Accelerator—to drive data-driven solutions and AI adoption in complex organisations.
Solution & enterprise architecture: Designing high-level and low-level architecture for enterprise solutions and migrations: LLD structures, RFP and scope, delivery templates and technical direction so teams can execute with clarity.
DevOps & CI/CD: Building and leading DevOps practices and teams: GitLab CI/CD pipelines, standardised build–test–deploy, and automation from code to production. Unblocking delivery with reusable patterns and concrete decisions.
Cloud & containers: Migrating legacy workloads to cloud-native: Kubernetes, Helm, Docker, Podman, AWS, OpenShift. Dual strategies (e.g. K8s + Ansible) for resilience.
Observability & monitoring: Introducing and running observability in production: ELK stack, OpenTelemetry, APM and tracing. Reducing incident resolution time and improving visibility across cloud and on-prem workloads.
Integration & full stack: Back-end and integration: Java, Spring, Spring Boot, JPA, REST, SOA, Oracle Service Bus, Talend, data migration and reporting. Front-end experience with Angular.
Governance & delivery: Business cases, KPIs and OKRs; RFP and scope, vendor negotiation, governance frameworks and delivery processes. Managing and aligning cross-department teams; working with enterprise architects on technical direction.
Compliance & security: Embedding DevSecOps in the delivery lifecycle: NIS2, ISO27001, sanction screening and regulatory alignment. Compliance and financial-crime prevention in high-volume environments.
